trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Salt Lake City
There were no other sightings in Salt Lake City on or around June 14th 2010
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsOutside smoking and looked up to see a bright white light in the Western sky. Seemed like it was moving like another airplane (which was closer), but not red and green lights. Just very bright white light. I watched it move and then in suddenly (within a matter of seconds) appeared to move vertically, the light faded and then disappeared from view.
Summary: Bright white light moves slowly across sky then vertical, light fades and disappears.
